BotA_HeapStack Class Reference

A Heap Stack of TreeNodes. It can work like a chainedList to sort TreeNodes in order of cost. Smallest is always root treeNode of stack. More...

#include <BotA_HeapStack.h>

Detailed Description

A Heap Stack of TreeNodes. It can work like a chainedList to sort TreeNodes in order of cost. Smallest is always root treeNode of stack.

void BotA_HeapStack::minHeapify ( int  cell  )  [protected]
